experience.title: IT Support & Infrastructure Manager
responsibilities: Lead technical support, infrastructure, and pre-sales teams, optimizing KPIs, processes, resource planning, and customer satisfaction.
Deliver pre-sales and post-sales support, resolving incidents, collaborating with international vendors, and conducting technical demonstrations of cataloged products.
Manage the internal network, oversee infrastructure projects, IT asset maintenance, data security, and proactive or corrective interventions.
Direct internal and external training initiatives, including needs analysis, Qualiopi-certified sessions, and consulting services.
Contribute to brand representation through webinars, social media, and professional events.

experience.title: Software & Hardware Support
responsibilities: Supported key accounts, managed kiosks and payment terminals, and organized partner interventions.
Trained clients remotely/on-site and assisted with after-sales service, including IT component repairs.
Managed customer/provider disputes, defined resolution plans, and updated maintenance procedures.
Improved the GLPI ticketing system and supported quality management in line with ISO 9001 standards.

experience.title: L2+ Software Support
responsibilities: Provided IT support, troubleshooting issues across systems, networks, and applications, including urgent requests.
Installed, updated, and maintained IT equipment, software, and internal tools.
Trained clients remotely/on-site and managed non-contractual services like database cleaning.
Led the support team in the manager's absence, monitoring KPIs and ensuring process compliance.
